title.label: It‚Äôs okay, we won‚Äôt be offended

content.label: Drop the ‚Äúrun‚Äù and call this pocket pool. Other than that fun game.
This is a *30-SECOND AD* good game. It‚Äôs simple, but *30-SECOND AD* difficult to *30-SECOND AD* master. The multipliers *30-SECOND AD* are inter-*30-SECOND AD*-esting.

title.label: The music makes you want to kill yourself

content.label: The game is great I‚Äôm only giving it 3 stars because you will want to put peanut butter on a pistol after an hour of listening to the music.

I get the need for ads to sustain developers of free-to-play apps, but give me a break. The game itself is a fun diversion, but after a couple of weeks, I deleted it. Life‚Äôs too short to be stuck in an ad with game breaks. 

These are the full-on thirty-second ads with extra time added for the X to appear. Oh, and those ‚Äúfind the X to close‚Äù ads are annoying, too.

What finally did it for me was starting the app after a couple of days of not playing, doing the break to start the game, and then immediately starting a full ad right as soon as the balls stopped moving. It reminded me of why I stopped playing to begin with.

Do yourself a favor and find something else to do with your time. Unless, of course, you enjoy being an ad Guinea Pig.

title.label: Good game but too many bugs and ads

content.label: Not sure if this is only me but the app now just locks up when it goes to commercial. May need to check this out because it renders the game unplayable.

Impossible to bank when object ball is on a rail. Object ball moves a few cm but stays frozen to rail. ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è After a shot cue ball keeps rolling until its in a bad spot on table. Impossible to control cue ball speed. Choke ads too.

title.label: Excellent game but needs multiplayer mode

content.label:
Needs multiplayer mode so we can play with friends and family. 

Solid app otherwise and excellent music.
I have played over 2000 rounds of this game in pursuit of the perfect score of 800. High score 776... wish me luck!
Super fun you should add more ability to customize or pvp games or something

This game is fun. Your description of what you get for $3.99 doesn‚Äôt say it will remove ads. Will it?  Also, as of 6/29/20 the ads all started showing up as black screens that won‚Äôt end. Can you fix that please?

title.label: Used to be fun but needs updated/changed

content.label: I‚Äôve played this game off and on for awhile. I really liked how I could just play a few games pretty quickly. The ads are out of hand. I can understand the need for ads, I get it, but these ads are bugged and appear way too often. I opened the app and realized I needed more bank money, so I watched an ad. After the ad, the app crashed. I reopened money was taken from the bank for something. I then go back to play a tournament, and the screen popped up for another ad which then crashed the app again. I reopened noticed that money was gone from the bank again and was finally able to play the tournament. So not only so these ads crash the app, they also happen every game. The screen pops up and stares that they know everyone hates ads and you won‚Äôt see one for 3 games, however, it‚Äôs every game. This used to be really fun to just waste some time on and I really supporting developers who don‚Äôt use micro transactions for their apps, but this game went really downhill and needs an update.

This started as a well designed...commercial...game with neat...commercial...graphics and...commercial...game action. The cue action can be a little...commercial...wonky in that when you...commercial...use a particular...commercial...stroke you do not get the same resulting...commercial...english on the...commercial...ball.  Is it me or does the...commercial...8 ball spin always put the... commercial...high numbers on the opposite....commercial...end of the table?

The game is worth a...commercial...4 star rating.  That drops to...commercial..2 stars because of the incredible...commercial... number of...commercial...ads that also...commercial... obnoxiously over-ride ...commercial...muted volume settings.

I get that...commercial...ads pay for the...commercial... development and is...commercial...deserved.  But...commercial...Zach, lets get real here.  I won‚Äôt pay the upgrade because I...commercial...believe you will just keep... commercial...finding ways to...commercial...insert ads.  (Watch this...commercial...ad to unlock this skin, level,...commercial...etc).

Your next...commercial...review will happen...commercial...in 2 downloads.
wayy toooo manyyyyyy addddddds. understand the need to make money but it just is to much.

IS IN THE WRONG SPOT. Put it in the middle or something. It‚Äôs awkward and it happens all the time on my iPhone that when I swipe up it throws up my phone‚Äôs options menu. Come on, man. Have you even played it?
See title.
Interesting how the 10x (rotating) spots rarely seem to line up with any balls in front of them. Strange.

Close, but not close enough. I was winning the game, then it sneaks in and takes my money through the timer. Just like that your bank is empty. Just not into it. Not enough there. Certainly not enough to pay money for. Its to one sided. Reminds me of gambling in the casino. House always winsüòê.

title.label: App keeps blacking out after ads

content.label:
Maybe it‚Äôs a sign I need the pro version, but I frequent get a black screen after an ad plays that totally prevents me from continuing the game. Exiting and re-entering the app doesn‚Äôt work, only a phone reset or waiting hours before the app suddenly loads as normal again. 

Overall it‚Äôs a lot of fun for a billiards fan like me, but the frequent blackouts are incredibly annoying.

I‚Äôve noticed when upon the break that the cue ball bounces right back than a normal pool game should. Also upon breaking most of the time balls stay near the back half of the table and never scatter evenly around the table, this game needs to be made a little more realistic to the game. When I‚Äôve played pool and if I‚Äôm lucky after the break the eight gets pocketed you automatically win, not here! How about adding a masse button?

Please add a way to one tap adjust angle, it‚Äôs really difficult when you lift your finger and the angle adjusts 5 degrees to the left. It‚Äôs also hard to judge the power of the hit.

Other than my whiny 2 gripes very well done! Please look into these!

First off, it‚Äôs a great concept and really nice looks, but:
‚Ä¢Ball physics aren‚Äôt way off
‚Ä¢Sometimes it days ‚Äúwe won‚Äôt show you an ad for 3 games, and then I see an add right after my game
‚Ä¢some of the adds just show up as a grey screen so you have to force close the app
‚Ä¢again, I‚Äôm deleting it because I got fusturated by the ball physics (ball would bounce off randomly, not on the projected line)
Shots are not accurate based on what is shown by the guideline. Unpredictable shots makes the game less fun. I‚Äôll pass on this game until it‚Äôs fixed.

title.label: Keeps saying to buy this app

content.label: I have bought it. I think twice already. Deleted it and reinstalled. It does not show that it was already purchased. How to fix this?

I understand that ads are necessary, but now the ads are causing the app to freeze. No ad appears, no close this window box, just a blank screen. I have to exit the game and restart the app to continue play.
The balls take FOREVER to stop moving. There should be an option to speed up the the follow-through. So annoying that I deleted the app shortly after downloading it.

title.label: False advertising on frequency of ads

content.label: For some reason the app feels compelled to tell you that it will show you an ad after every third game.  And that‚Äôs a lie.  Shows an ad after every game.  Why bother with the false promise?

title.label: I love it. It helps me focus

content.label: This is a game that is so well done that suddenly is working as a therapist. Addictive in a positive way. Go ahead... try it

I really like this game but sometimes I‚Äôll miss a shot and close the game and come back to it mid-game and the white ball won‚Äôt replace. It‚Äôs really addicting to play but it‚Äôs kind of a random chance of the ball getting replaced and you don‚Äôt know when it‚Äôll go back to normal.
Pure junk of the highest order

There is a glitch that when you playing any game after a little while the screen will be tinted gray and the screen freezes but other than that it‚Äôs an amazing game also I thank that should add when the game is over a button that says retry but the cost is that you have to watch a add

The game modes are fun but there are loads of frustrating problems. First, the physics are pretty bad, when you break 80% of the time half the balls clump together. Also for some reason the indicator that shows where the ball will go once hit is completely off if you hit the ball hard enough. It‚Äôs ridiculous that we‚Äôre given a line that is meant to show where the ball will go that is NOT accurate. Please fix this i cant continue to play like this. Lastly, why is there no option to add spin to the cue?? This could alleviate some of the frustration of the balls being clumped by being able to spin the cue and knocking them around some.

App crashes every time after playing an ad. Enter a tournament, it takes your chips, forces an ad and crashes, leaving you poorer and stupider for retrying to run this poorly coded app more than twice.

title.label: I'd give it 5 stars if not for the type of ad support

But allowing those ads to start with sound, is just crossing the line. When these types of games are played in the middle of boring meetings, ads with sound are despicable and make you delete the app and hate the developer

title.label: Five stars for proper use of advertising

content.label:
As far as pool games go, it‚Äôs solid. Ads are present, but not intrusive, and a warning shows up beforehand telling you how many games you can play before the next ad. 

Kudos to the dev for being kind to fellow humans. This one is staying on my phone.

Big fan of this game and developer. I‚Äôve been playing this since it was released and it‚Äôs perfect for quick games and killing time. However, I‚Äôm experiencing several similar issues as others. Balls mysteriously stopping mid-roll, I‚Äôve lost balls/lives even after hitting something in, and the angles no longer seem to line up at times. You get used to how this works after playing over 1500 games. Something currently isn‚Äôt right but I have confidence it will be fixed. All of this devs games are solid.

I don‚Äôt know if this is a ploy to get you to buy the game , but when you play insta tournament, it will start you, take your credits, go to break , then come back and charge you again to enter, and you haven‚Äôt even played yet. So sometimes you‚Äôre out, double your credits. Not a huge deal, but annoying.
